events.message: We have successfully received Jane Doe's application for the Software Engineer position at our company.
Jane's application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department due to her software development skills.
Recruiter Mike Smith has been assigned to Jane's application to coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
Mike completed an initial screening call with Jane to assess her background and software engineering experience.
Jane responded positively to the initial screening and expressed strong enthusiasm for the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for Jane on May 5th, focusing on software engineering and coding challenges.
Jane successfully completed her technical interview, demonstrating strong skills in software development and problem-solving.
HR interview has been scheduled for Jane to discuss company culture and benefits following her technical interview success.
The HR interview went well, with Jane expressing alignment with company values and interest in the position.
An offer for the Software Engineer position has been proposed to Jane, highlighting competitive salary and benefits.
Jane responded with positive feedback about the offer and asked a few questions regarding the start date and onboarding.
Jane formally accepted the offer to join as a Software Engineer, expressing excitement to start working with the team.
Jane's onboarding process has begun, including orientation sessions and setup of necessary development tools.
The hiring process for Jane Doe as a Software Engineer has been successfully closed with all paperwork completed.
